value.title: Create a data connection shortcut with PBIDS files - Power BI desktop update October 2019
value.excerpt: The power bi team has released a new Power bi file extension called PBIDS (power bi direct source), that allows you to configure a file with all the connection details of a data source. Here is how you configure it and my thoughts on it.  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/34-veyaEF1U" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Create a Datetime column in Power Query/ M language - Download 44
value.excerpt: In today's video I will show you how to create a Datetime column in Power Query. For that we will use three M functions: List.DateTimes, Duration.TotalDays, DateTime.LocalNow().  Download number #44 in the download center: https://curbal.com/donwload-center  Create calendars playlist: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-tg0m-WT1xE&list=PLDz00l_jz6zwrYvfWcWITHMiZf3G-HDq7

value.title: Create a link to a Power BI report with External tools functionality
value.excerpt: The external tools functionality in Power BI allows you to launch external applications from Power BI Desktop.  In today's video, I will show you how you can do to launch a Power BI report.  Link to the JSON and pbix file:  Community files - download 62: https://curbal.com/donwload-center  SUBSCRIBE

value.title: Create an environment for Power BI to run your Python scripts
value.excerpt: In today's video I will show you how you create an environment to run python scripts for Power BI.   If you haven't work with Python before, I recommend you to check this two videos first: Install python and more: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=M2kZe9Pi6xg Guide to python and R: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BI8FcI_sgR0

value.title: Create an excel based budget app with PowerApps and use it in Power BI

The app will be a budget file app that we will them import into Power BI for further analysis, both the data and the app√∂  The possibilities are endeless!! Enjoy!    Looking for a download file?

value.title: Data densification in Power Query/ Power BI
value.excerpt: Data densification is basically a technique to densify the dataset or in simpler terms, increase the number of observations in the dataset.   If you want to learn how to do that in Power BI or Power Query, check this video!  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center
